name: py-zarr

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Zarr is a Python package providing an implementation of chunked,
compressed, N-dimensional arrays.

dependencies.name: py-fasteners
dependencies.description: A python package that provides useful locks.

dependencies.name: py-numcodecs
dependencies.description:
Numcodecs is a Python package providing buffer compression and
transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication
applications.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-xarray
dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.

dependent_to.name: py-nvidia-modulus
dependent_to.description: A deep learning framework for AI-driven multi-physics systems.

dependent_to.name: py-xarray-tensorstore
dependent_to.description:
Xarray-TensorStore is a small library that allows opening Zarr arrays
into Xarray via TensorStore, instead of the standard Zarr-Python
library.
